contents.text: Welcome to Smarking, your San Francisco-based parking data consolidation and optimization experts.
For sales and product information, press '1'.
To request a demonstration of our platform, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for demo scheduling.

navigationGoals: I need to set up a quick demo of the Smarking platform.
As manager of a veteran housing facility, I’d like to schedule a live demo of your platform.
I want to schedule a live demo to explore the platform's real-time parking data consolidation and optimization features.
I'd like to schedule a demonstration of your parking data platform.
I’d like to schedule a demo of the Smarking platform to evaluate its parking data consolidation features for my campus research.

contents.text: To learn more about pricing and plans, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing team.

navigationGoals: I want to review pricing tiers and subscription plans.
I need detailed pricing and plan options to budget for our community center parking program.
I want a detailed pricing breakdown for API data ingestion, analytics modules, and enterprise license tiers.
I'd like to learn about your pricing plans and costs.
I need detailed information on Smarking’s pricing tiers and subscription plans for potential adoption in my university lab.

contents.text: For technical support and system troubleshooting, press '2'.
For API and integration assistance, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to an integration specialist.

navigationGoals: I need assistance integrating Smarking's API into our system.
I’m integrating your API with our existing facility management system and need assistance.
I need assistance integrating Smarking's RESTful API, including endpoint configuration and OAuth authentication setup.
I need help integrating your API with my system.
I’m integrating Smarking’s API with my traffic simulation software and need assistance with authentication and endpoint configuration.

contents.text: To report a system issue or bug, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our support team.

navigationGoals: I need to report a technical issue I'm encountering with the platform.
I want to report a bug in the real-time dashboard that’s misreading my parking sensor data.
I want to report a bug in the real-time dashboard data refresh module that's causing stale data.
I need to report a technical issue I'm experiencing with the system.
I encountered an unexpected error in the parking occupancy data feed and want to report a bug to the support team.
